name: Accordian Main
description: An on-page headline that can be expanded to reveal more information

name: Divider Main
description: Display a CSS faded divider rule

name: Hero Image Main
description: Display a single image with optional link. Image should be sized to 724px x 240px

name: Hero Text Main
description: HTML version of the hero cartridge for easier editability

name: Non Record Left Main
description: Displays a 'Non Record' result with image on 'Left' side to x px

name: Non Record Right Main
description: Displays a 'Non Record' result with image on 'Right' side to x px

name: Quick Links Main
description: Displays title box with a list of links and descriptions.

name: RSS Main
description: Displays RSS Feed in box title

name: Record Scroll Banner Main
description: Displays a record spotlight banner with scrollbar if needed

name: Results List Main
description: Displays search and navigation results in a list or grid view

name: Results List Header Main
description: Displays the header navigation for the record results list

name: Rotating Banner Main - Rotating Heros
description: Displays a rotating banner / hero images with optional links. A max of 7 images can be used. Max width is 1180px with no max height. Images will be centered.

name: Story Block Main
description: Group of 3 story blocks, Images have a max width of 360px. Height is not defined. Be sure to make the height and width of each image the same for each ofthe 3 images you use.

name: Title Text Main
description: Displays a Title box with a paragraph and linked text at end of paragraph. This cartridge is dynamic and the width will contract and expand up to 1180px max width.

name: Video Main
description: Video URL should contain the URL to file without the extention. The extention (mp4, webm, srt, and txt) will be added by the application

name: Video Hero Main
description: Video URL should contain the URL to file without the extention. The extention (mp4, webm, srt, and txt) will be added by the application

name: HTML Button Right
description: Open HTML text box with option to add Image Map beneath text

name: Rotating Image Right
description: Displays rotating images with optional links. Images should be 230px wide

name: Single Image Right
description: Displays single images with optional links. Images should be 230px wide. Height is variable

name: Full Width Breadcrumbs
description: Display breadcrumb and Title appropriate to the current refinement state

name: Content Slot Full
description: This is a dynamic cartridge that calls other cartridges

name: Super Hero
description: Full width carsousel with up to 6 images/captions all using H1 tag for their headline. There is no limit to the width of images.

name: Guided Navigation
description: Creates a container for navigation cartridges

name: Cover Image
description: Displays cover image below cover image

name: Product Info
description: Displays cover image below cover image

name: Ecommerce
description: Displays ecommerce block of code based on business logic

name: Tab Content
description: Displays tab content based on business logic with optional enchancements

name: Tab HTML
description: Open HTML text box that will fill tab

name: Tab Video
description: Video URL should contain the URL to the file without the extention. The extention (mp4, webm, srt, and txt) will be added by the application

name: Record Right HTML
description: Open HTML text box with width of 230px

name: Record Right Image
description: Displays a single image optional link. Images should be sized 230px wide

name: Record Right Rotating Image
description: Displays a rotating images optional link. Images should be sized 230px wide
